src:
September 2019, Indonesia Kedatangan 1,4 Juta Turis
01 Nov 2019, 11:05 by Johanes Randy Prakoso


Ilustrasi wisatawan (iStock)

Jakarta - Pihak Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) kembali mengeluarkan data kunjungan turis terbaru. Datanya, jumlah turis bulan September alami peningkatan.Hari Jumat ini (1/11/2019), pihak BPS mengeluarkan data terbaru kunjungan turis atau wisman (wisatawan mancanegara) ke Indonesia. Dari data tersebut terungkap, bahwa jumlah kunjungan wisman ke Indonesia September 2019 mengalami kenaikan 2,15 persen dibanding jumlah kunjungan pada September 2018. Sementara itu, jika dibandingkan dengan Agustus 2019, jumlah kunjungan wisman pada September 2019 mengalami penurunan sebesar 10,10 persen.Secara jumlah, selama bulan September 2019 kemarin Indonesia didatangi oleh sekitar 1,4 juta wisman lewat tiga pintu gerbang (udara, darat dan laut). Di mana jalur udara tetap jadi yang paling diminati wisatawan. Secara kumulatif (Januari-September 2019), jumlah kunjungan wisman ke Indonesia mencapai 12,27 juta kunjungan atau naik 2,63 persen dibandingkan dengan jumlah kunjungan wisman pada periode yang sama tahun 2018 yang berjumlah 11,96 juta kunjungan.Simak Video "Melihat Eloknya Jakarta dari Lensa Kamera"[Gambas:Video 20detik](rdy/rdy)
text:
September 2019, Indonesia Arrival of 1.4 Million Tourists
Nov 01 2019, 11:05 by Johanes Randy Prakoso


Traveler illustrations (iStock)

Jakarta - The Central Statistics Agency (BPS) has again released the latest tourist visit data. The data, the number of tourists in September experienced an increase. Today this Friday (1/11/2019), the BPS released the latest data on tourist arrivals or tourists (foreign tourists) to Indonesia. From these data it was revealed, that the number of foreign tourists visiting Indonesia in September 2019 had increased 2.15 percent compared to the number of visits in September 2018. Meanwhile, when compared with August 2019, the number of foreign tourists visiting in September 2019 had decreased by 10.10 percent. number, during September 2019 yesterday Indonesia was visited by around 1.4 million foreign tourists through three gates (air, land and sea). Where airways remain the most popular tourists. Cumulatively (January-September 2019), the number of foreign tourists visiting Indonesia reached 12.27 million visits, an increase of 2.63 percent compared with the number of foreign tourists visiting the same period in 2018, which amounted to 11.96 million visits. Jakarta from the Camera Lens "[Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (rdy / rdy)
